title: Blog Post Outline Generator
content:
Create a detailed outline for a blog post about {{topic}} that targets {{audience}}. Include the following sections:
1. Introduction
2. Key Points
3. Supporting Details
4. Conclusion
description: Generates a structured outline for blog posts with key sections

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The main topic of the blog post

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the blog post

title: Code Review Checklist
content:
Create a comprehensive code review checklist for {{language}} that covers: 
1. Code quality
2. Performance
3. Security
4. Documentation
5. Testing

Consider best practices and common pitfalls specific to {{language}}.
description: Generates a detailed code review checklist customized for specific programming languages

variables.name: language
variables.description: Programming language for the code review

title: Marketing Email Template
content: Write a compelling marketing email for {{product}} targeting {{customerSegment}}. The email should highlight the following benefits: {{benefits}}. Include a clear call-to-action.
description: Template for creating marketing emails with customizable elements

variables.name: benefits
variables.defaultValue: time savings, cost reduction, ease of use

title: Sales Script Generator
content:
Create a persuasive sales script for {{product}} that highlights its key benefits and addresses common customer objections. Include: 
1. Opening hook
2. Value proposition
3. Key benefits
4. Objection handling
5. Call to action
description: Generates professional sales scripts tailored to specific products or services

title: Technical Support Guide
content:
Create a step-by-step troubleshooting guide for {{issue}} that includes: 
1. Initial diagnosis
2. Common causes
3. Solution steps
4. Prevention tips
5. Escalation criteria
description: Generates technical support guides for common issues

title: Fitness Plan Creator
content:
Create a {{duration}} fitness plan for {{goal}} that includes: 
1. Weekly workout schedule
2. Exercise descriptions
3. Progress tracking
4. Nutrition tips
5. Safety guidelines
description: Generates personalized fitness plans based on specific goals

variables.name: goal
variables.description: Fitness goal (e.g., weight loss, muscle gain)

title: Product Review Generator
content:
Create a detailed review for {{product}} covering: 
1. Key features
2. Pros and cons
3. User experience
4. Value for money
5. Final verdict

title: Customer Service Response
content:
Create a professional response to a {{situation}} that: 
1. Shows empathy
2. Addresses the issue
3. Provides solution
4. Maintains brand voice
5. Includes follow-up
description: Generates customer service responses for various situations

title: Marketing Campaign Planner
content: Create a marketing campaign plan for {{campaign_name}} targeting {{audience}}. Include goals, strategies, and KPIs.

title: Recipe Generator
content:
Create a recipe for {{dish}} that includes: 
1. Ingredients list
2. Step-by-step instructions
3. Cooking time
4. Serving size
5. Nutritional info
